Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.flag

Class CommandValueFlag<T>

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.flag.CommandFlag
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.flag.CommandValueFlag<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the value.
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilterCommandFlag, PageCommandFlag
public class CommandValueFlag<T> extends CommandFlag
Represents a flag with a value.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandValueFlag

      protected CommandValueFlag(@NotNull @NotNull String key, @NotNull @NotNull List<String> aliases, @NotNull @NotNull Class<T> type, boolean optional, @Nullable T defaultValue, @Nullable @Nullable Function<String,T> context, @Nullable @Nullable Function<String,Collection<String>> completion)
      Creates a new flag.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the new flag.
      aliases - The aliases that also refer to this flag.
      type - The type of the value.
      optional - Allow for flag without value.
      defaultValue - The default value if optional is true and user does not specify a value.
      context - Function to parse string into value type.
      completion - Function to get completion for this flag.
